column6: THE BATTLE FOR CONTROL OF K'UN LUN HAS BEGUN! The Thirteen Chambers have opened, and all K'un Lun's schools gather to determine who is THE MASTER OF KUNG FU! As Master to the Lowest Caste, Shang-Chi attempts to enter the tournament in order to topple the despotic Zheng Zu. Will Shang-Chi, a wanted murderer, be able to elude his enemies long enough to face his father?
column8: | writer:Haden Blackman | penciller (cover):Francesco Francavilla | artist:Dalibor Talajic
